name: MusicalBumps
0:
”Alexa, play Musical Bumps”
”Alexa, open Musical Bumps”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: musical bumps
des:
Roll Up! Roll Up! It's time to play Musical Bumps with Alexa.

When the music starts, it's time to go crazy and throw some shapes! Dance like you've never danced before.

When the music stops....BUMP! Everybody to the ground! The last person to sit down is out.

Keep dancing and bumping until you're left with a winner!

Kids and grown-ups love to play this game. Similar to musical chairs and musical statues it's perfect for parties or playing amongst friends on a rainy indoor day.

It's time for Musical Bumps so get bumping!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
